enough to tell what your true intentions are."

"The creature has a sturdy shell-like exoskeleton that seems to
protect it from most kinds of attacks. Only piercing and otherwordly
powers seem to penetrate the surface effectively."
"The skin, or the surface layer feels like hardened leather that
has burned to crisp. The skin gets thicker towards the head of
the creature and which is especially well protected."

"This creature... It looks like a mishmash of beehives. Even the
"I have no explanation for this. I mean it obviously looks human-like
The creature looks like a mishmash of beehives. Even the insides
There really is no explanation for this. What makes it even more

Black Kalev has got a blank expression on his face. He's slowly
chewing a brown tuft of weed in his mouth.
The more you look at Kalev, the more annoyed he starts to look.
\N[16] is staring calmly at the distant horizon...
\N[17] is looking around, mouth open, being his clueless
\N[19] seems itchy and twitchy. He is constantly scratching
himself. Even from places that are not suitable to public...
\N[22] tilts his head sideways as you try to communicate
\N[28] has got an oddly pleased expression on his face. His
disturbed smile gives you the creeps...
\N[29] looks very tense and stiff. Seems like he cannot have
a moment's rest as he's waiting for your next orders.
"Are we sure this is the right direction?"
"These alleys are a good shortcut between the city centre and the
"Although the mist makes them a little more intimidating than how
"Maybe it's just because of the wind."
"I prefer the open streets. At least we can see what's ahead."
"I know these streets pretty well... If you need directions, you
"You could get there pretty easily following the main roads...
At least you could before all this happened. I'm not sure if the
"If we stick to the big roads, we should get there pretty easily..."
"North from here is the shopping district... That could be called
"We need to go south for that..."
"The stairs lead us out of the city to the old town..."
"Not sure why we'd go there... but there it is in any case..."
